name: Broken Mirrors
description:
Broken Mirrors is a JRPG by Ground Zero Games.

It all starts with a dream. You meet a woman, she helps you...

You wake up. 

How do you know it wasn't real..?

This Game Is A Demo.

NOTE: THIS IS MY FIRST RPG MAKER GAME! IF YOU ENCOUNTER SOMETHING OFF WITH THE GAME, REPORT IT TO ME IMMEDIATELY!!!
